name: conditional-settings
description: A small extension to set different settings based on conditions

hasFile.description: Filename to check whether it exists in workspace or not.

always.description: Enable the settings always regardless of other conditions.

conditions.description: Conditions based on what settings needs to be changed.

settingsToChange.description: Workspace settings that needs to be modified based on conditions.

runShellCommand.description: Shell command to be executed, these arguments will be passed to child_process.spawn, so same signature can be followed here to values.

conditionalConfig.configs.description: A set of conditions and configs to be changed.
